      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"><info>

      <name form="short"/>

    <layout>
      <text macro="author-name"/>
      <text variable="title" prefix=", "/>
    </layout></bibliography></style>
